civilopediaText.text: Don't say it. Don't even think it. If you do this mod will crash your game, and all your save files will explode. I'm warning you.

name: Hypogeum
uniques: Gain [5] [Faith] (modified by game speed) <upon constructing [Building] [in this city]>
